question: As per the recent ‘Hurun Global Rich List 2020’, which country has the highest number of billionaires?
explanation:
As per the recently released ‘Hurun Global Rich List 2020’, China is home to the highest number of billionaires of the world.
The report placed Amazon founder and CEO Jeff Bezos in the top rank, who possesses wealth amounting to $140 bn. Microsoft Founder Bill Gates is in the third spot, while Mukesh Ambani was placed in the 9th place with $67 bn. He is the only Indian to feature in the Top-10 list and he is the richest in Asia.
